Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller

Class GameServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.GameServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class GameServer extends Object implements Runnable
This class represents an interface for the client to the network, in order to handle the communication between client and server.
Author:
Riccardo Milici, Riccardo Motta, Matteo Negro

  • Constructor Details

    • GameServer

      public GameServer(Socket hostSocket, ClientController client) throws IOException
      Default class constructor.
      Parameters:
      hostSocket - The TCP socket associated with the current connection.
      client - The ClientController instance that's currently running.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if an error occurs during the input and output streams creation.

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject getMessage() throws IOException
      Gets a message from the server and converts it into a JsonObject.
      Returns:

      Throws:
